example.text: Although Exxon spent heavily during the latest quarter [*-2] to clean up the Alaskan shoreline blackened [*] by its huge oil spill , those expenses as well as the cost of a continuing spill-related program are covered [*-1] by $ 880 million [*U*] in charges taken [*] during the first half .
